name: Tumblr - Add Link the link button
description: Replaces the boring "Link" post icon with a GIF of Link from Legend of Zelda, moving the link icon out of the way and then standing in it's place. Inspired by a GIF posted on Tumblr by http://m4ster-shortpants.tumblr.com/

user.name: EdAdams
user.about: Tumblr: edwrad.tumblr.com Email: edadams101 at gmail dot com (support, technical enquiries, etc.)

additional_info:
Works in Firefox (with Stylish) and Chrome (as a user script).
If Tumblr see this and want me to remove it I will. Contact me at ed_adams@live.com
